question: The "Luxor Massacre" happened in which country?
explanation: Luxor Massacre is a mass shooting - mass murder massacre of 62 people, mostly tourists, on 17 November 1997 at Deir el-Bahari, an archaeological site and major tourist attraction located across the Nile River in the Luxor city of Egypt. This massacre was sanctioned by anti-national extremist forces of Egypt to devastate the Egyptian economy and to strengthen support for anti-government forces to destabilize Egypt's normalcy and integrity.
